courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Agribusiness Management
courses.description: This program integrates agricultural science with business management principles to prepare students for careers in the agricultural business sector.

course_units.title: Principles of Microeconomics
course_units.description: Basic concepts and principles of microeconomics applied to agriculture.

course_units.title: Introduction to Agribusiness
course_units.description: Overview of the agribusiness sector and its components.

course_units.title: Agricultural Mathematics
course_units.description: Mathematical applications in agricultural economics and business.

course_units.title: Principles of Macroeconomics
course_units.description: Basic concepts and principles of macroeconomics applied to agriculture.

course_units.title: Agricultural Marketing
course_units.description: Principles and practices of marketing agricultural products.

course_units.title: Financial Accounting for Agribusiness
course_units.description: Accounting principles and practices for agribusiness enterprises.

course_units.title: Agricultural Production Economics
course_units.description: Economic principles applied to agricultural production.

course_units.title: Natural Resource Economics
course_units.description: Economic analysis of natural resource use and management.

course_units.title: Agricultural Policy
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural policies and their impacts.

course_units.title: Farm Management
course_units.description: Principles and practices of farm business management.

course_units.title: Agricultural Price Analysis
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural prices and price determination.

course_units.title: Agricultural Value Chain Analysis
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural value chains and their development.

course_units.title: Research Methods in Agricultural Economics
course_units.description: Research methodologies for agricultural economics and agribusiness.

course_units.title: International Agricultural Trade
course_units.description: Principles and practices of international trade in agricultural products.

course_units.title: Environmental Economics
course_units.description: Economic analysis of environmental issues related to agriculture.
